common_resources: Try a free intro course on a reputable platform (Coursera, edX, Khan Academy, freeCodeCamp).
Use official documentation for tools you touch (language docs, framework docs).
Watch a beginner playlist, then replicate a small example on your own.
Join a student community or forum to ask questions and learn from others.

careers_poly_work.name: Mobile Application Developer
careers_poly_work.work_style_line: Work style: build features, test often, collaborate with designers and teammates.
careers_poly_work.salary_outlook_line: Pay range: around low-to-mid $2k+ for fresh grads, varies by company and skills.
careers_poly_work.employment_outlook_line: Outlook: steady. Stronger with a simple app portfolio and internships.
impact_lines: Build apps that help users solve daily problems.
